testCase.name: TIP712 Utils destructTypeFromString 'string[]' should return [{name: 'string', size: undefined}, [null]]
TIP712 Utils destructTypeFromString 'uint8[2][][4]' should return [{name: 'uint', size: 8}, [2, null, 4]]
TIP712 Utils destructTypeFromString 'bytes64' should return [{ name: 'bytes', size: 64 }, []]
TIP712 Utils destructTypeFromString 'bool' should return [{ name: 'bool', size: undefined }, []]
TIP712 Utils destructTypeFromString 'bool[any]' should not throw and return ['bool', []]
TIP712 Utils destructTypeFromString V2DutchOrder should not be splitted even though it contains a number not related to the size
TIP712 Utils destructTypeFromString KvnV2 should not be splitted even though it contains a number at the end not related to the size
TIP712 Utils destructTypeFromString should not throw with undefined
TIP712 Utils constructTypeDescByteString should return 1 as hex int and 01 as hexa string
TIP712 Utils constructTypeDescByteString should return 129 as hex int and 81 as hexa string
TIP712 Utils constructTypeDescByteString should return 193 as hex int and c1 as hexa string
TIP712 Utils constructTypeDescByteString should return 207 as hex int and cf as hexa string
TIP712 Utils constructTypeDescByteString should return 143 as hex int and 8f as hexa string
TIP712 Utils constructTypeDescByteString should return 15 as hex int and
TIP712 Utils constructTypeDescByteString should throw if typeValue >= 16
TIP712 Utils constructTypeDescByteString should return the same as the bitewise implementation
TIP712 Utils makeTypeEntryStructBuffer should return the correct buffer for entry type `int`
TIP712 Utils makeTypeEntryStructBuffer should return the correct buffer for entry type `int8`
TIP712 Utils makeTypeEntryStructBuffer should return the correct buffer for entry type `uint`
TIP712 Utils makeTypeEntryStructBuffer should return the correct buffer for entry type `uint64`
TIP712 Utils makeTypeEntryStructBuffer should return the correct buffer for entry type `address`
TIP712 Utils makeTypeEntryStructBuffer should return the correct buffer for entry type `bool`
TIP712 Utils makeTypeEntryStructBuffer should return the correct buffer for entry type `string`
TIP712 Utils makeTypeEntryStructBuffer should return the correct buffer for entry type `string[3][]`
TIP712 Utils makeTypeEntryStructBuffer should return the correct buffer for entry type `bytes`
TIP712 Utils makeTypeEntryStructBuffer should return the correct buffer for entry type `bytes32`
TIP712 Utils makeTypeEntryStructBuffer should return the correct buffer for entry type `bytes32[4]`
TIP712 Utils makeTypeEntryStructBuffer should return the correct buffer for entry type `bytes32[4][]`
TIP712 Utils makeTypeEntryStructBuffer should return the correct buffer for entry type `bytes32[4][][256]`
TIP712 Utils makeTypeEntryStructBuffer should return the correct buffer for entry type `custom`
